# stateflow

Documentation
-------------

- https://stateflow.readthedocs.io/en/latest/


Installation
------------

Install stateflow by running:

    pip install stateflow

Contribute
----------

- Issue Tracker: https://github.com/peper0/stateflow/issues
- Source Code: https://github.com/peper0/stateflow
